#  Top Bluetooth speakers at any budget for 2020

##

From under $100 to over $1,000, there's a Bluetooth speaker for everyone

Like GearBrain on Facebook

[ ](https://www.gearbrain.com/u/alistair) [Alistair
Charlton](https://www.gearbrain.com/u/alistair)

May 26 2020

Bluetooth speakers come in all shapes and sizes. You can clip one to your
backpack for some tunes while you hike, stick a waterproof speaker to your
shower, take one out into the garden, or drop four figures on a powerhouse of
a phone-controlled sound system. You can find speakers that fit almost any
budget, and there is a wide range of styles and features. The one thing they
have in common, of course, is[ Bluetooth](https://www.gearbrain.com/how-do-
bluetooth-devices-work-2645015200.html), making it easy to play music from
your smartphone, tablet, or other device.

 **Read More:**

  * [Top waterproof Bluetooth speakers for the shower, beach or pool](https://www.gearbrain.com/best-bluetooth-waterproof-speakers-shower-2515182255.html)
  * [The best premium and luxury smart speakers](https://www.gearbrain.com/best-premium-luxury-smart-speakers-2638915039.html)
  * [8 top wireless headphones with active noise cancelling](https://www.gearbrain.com/top-active-noise-cancelling-headphones-2645762482.html)

 **Bluetooth speakers under $50**

The Clip 3 is priced at just under $50JBL

  * JBL Clip 3

JBL's expansive Bluetooth speaker range starts with the [$50 Clip
3](https://www.amazon.com/JBL-Waterproof-Portable-Bluetooth-
Speaker/dp/B07Q6ZWMLR/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=jbl+clip&qid=1590153535&sr=8-2),
a palm-sized speaker with integrated clip for attaching to your backpack while
out on a hike. It's also waterproof, so doesn't mind being rained on, and you
could even hang it up in the shower. The battery lasts for a 10 hours, says
JBL, and the Clip 3 comes in a wide range of colors, including black, blue,
green, red, white and a couple of camouflage options.

  * Anker Soundcore 2

If you don't need the clip design of the JBL, you could try the [Anker
Soundcore 2](https://www.amazon.com/Upgraded-Anker-Soundcore-Bluetooth-
Waterproof/dp/B01MTB55WH/ref=redir_mobile_desktop?ie=UTF8&aaxitk=KlCjRYHkyd0TEPKWVO8lrQ&hsa_cr_id=9556640000601&ref_=sb_s_sparkle),
which costs $40, is waterproof, and available in black, blue and red. Anker
claims the battery is good for an impressive 24 hours of playback, and if you
buy two you can create a stereo pair.

  

[ JBL CLIP 3 - Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black List Price:
$49.95 New From: $49.95 in Stock Used From: $44.99 in Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Q6ZWMLR?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

  

**Bluetooth speakers under $100**

The UE Boom 2 is now under $100Ultimate Ears

  * Ultimate ears Boom 2

Doubling your budget puts Bluetooth speakers by Ultimate Ears into reach. The
second-generation [Boom 2](https://www.amazon.com/Ultimate-Ears-Bluetooth-
Waterproof-
Shockproof/dp/B014M8ZO8S/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=ultimate+ears+boom+2&qid=1590153933&sr=8-1)
is a portable Bluetooth speaker that is water- and shock-proof. It is
available in a wide range of colors, promises 360-degree sound, and has an
integrated tripod mount with a hook for attaching it to your bag – or indeed,
raising it off the ground on a tripod.

The Boom 2, which has up to 15 hours of battery life, can currently be bought
for just under $100 – or even $75 if you opt for a refurbished model – while
the newer [Boom 3](https://www.amazon.com/Ultimate-Ears-Portable-Waterproof-
Bluetooth/dp/B07YN9LM1L/ref=sr_1_6?dchild=1&keywords=ultimate+ears+boom+3&qid=1590153986&sr=8-6)
is priced at $120.

  * JBL Charge 3

An alternative at the sub-$100 price point is the [JBL Charge
3](https://www.amazon.com/JBL-JBLCHARGE3BLKAM-Waterproof-Portable-
Bluetooth/dp/B01F24RHF4/ref=sr_1_8?dchild=1&keywords=denon+envaya&qid=1590154070&sr=8-8),
which previously cost $150, is waterproof, available in several colors, and
has 20 hours of battery life.

[ Ultimate Ears BOOM 2 Portable Waterproof & Shockproof Bluetooth Speaker -
Patches List Price: $68.99 New From: $115.00 in Stock Used From: $68.99 in
Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B014M8ZO8S?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

  

**Bluetooth speakers under $200**

Marshall Stockwell II Bluetooth speakerMarshall

  * Marshall Stockwell II

Most Bluetooth speakers look fairly uninteresting, but that couldn't be said
of the $170 [Marshall Stockwell
II](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Q12WDP2/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?dchild=1&keywords=Marshall+Stockwell+II&qid=1590155497&sr=8-1-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEzVVZHM0dEM1JBUFM3JmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUExMDE0MDkxM01BQ0NFQ1A4NkIzSyZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwNzg3NDQzNElFUjJCM0M2UFhHJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ==).
Styled to look like a much larger amplifier, the Stockwell II was recently
reduced from $250, offers 20 hours of battery life, and comes with the latest
Bluetooth 5.0 wireless technology.

There's also IPX4 water and dust resistance, and the look is completed by a
set of analogue knobs to adjust volume, bass and treble.

  * Bose SoundLink Mini II

A more subtle alternative is the [Bose SoundLink Mini
II](https://www.amazon.com/Bose-soundlink-Mini-II-
Bluetooth/dp/B01LZRFI5C/ref=sr_1_2?crid=1UZ4T2V0ECLWD&dchild=1&keywords=bose+soundlink&qid=1590155690&sprefix=bose+soundlink%2Caps%2C214&sr=8-2).
Now available for half price ($150 down from $300), the speaker is compact but
promises string sound performance, and the usual pumping bass Bose systems are
known for. Battery life is a modest 10 hours.

For just over $200, the [Denon DSB-250 Envaya](https://www.amazon.com/Denon-
DSB-250-Premium-Portable-
Bluetooth/dp/B0777KNQH2/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1H7TCUQ6VS6DU&dchild=1&keywords=denon+envaya+dsb-250bt&qid=1590157937&sprefix=denon+envay%2Caps%2C201&sr=8-1)
is a solid option, with a compact design but powerful sound and 13 hours of
battery life.

  

[ Marshall Stockwell II Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black List Price: $167.38
New From: $164.95 in Stock Used From: $144.31 in Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07Q12WDP2?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

  

**Bluetooth speakers under $500**

The Sonos Move has Wi-Fi for indoors and Bluetooth for outsideSonos

  * [Sonos Move](https://the.gearbrain.com/devices/E866DDEE7D9D11EA8A2EC4C797A160FB.html)

Sonos announced its first Bluetooth speaker, the $399 Move, in 2019. Designed
for indoor and outdoor listening, the [Sonos Move](https://www.sonos.com/en-
gb/shop/move.html?ds_rl=1256519&ds_rl=1256522&ds_rl=1256552&gclid=CjwKCAjw8J32BRBCEiwApQEKgadIQVS0YJD-354gAm4iuXbJn9YsJzgWOE67BleWwbL96V3Jd2B4uRoC7HYQAvD_BwE&gclsrc=aw.ds)
connects via both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. You can use the former indoors just
like any other Sonos speaker, plus access to Apple AirPlay2, Amazon Alexa and
Google Assistant.

Take the Sonos Move outside (or away from the home) and switch to Bluetooth,
when it works just like any other wireless speaker, with a 10-hour battery
life. It has IP56 water and dust resistance, making it weatherproof.

  * Bose SoundLink Revolve+

Another Bose option, and this time it's the $299 [SoundLink
Revolve+](https://www.amazon.com/Bose-SoundLink-Portable-Long-Lasting-
Bluetooth/dp/B06XCW4VFS/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=bose+soundlink+revolve+%2B&qid=1590158020&sr=8-1),
a powerful Bluetooth speaker with 16 hours of battery life, an aluminum body
with IPX4 water and dust resistance, and the ability to create a stereo pair
if you buy two.

  

[ Sonos Move - Battery-powered Smart Speaker, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth with Alexa
built-in - Black​​​​​​​ List Price: $399.00 New From: $399.00 in Stock Used
From: $367.08 in Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07W95RBZM?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

  

**Bluetooth speakers under $1,000**

The Formation Wedge is a premium Bluetooth speakerBowers & Wilkins

At this price point, you might want to consider broadening your horizons
behind Bluetooth. That isn't to say Bluetooth isn't a useful feature of any
speaker, but audiophiles will tell you that sound systems at this price should
be fed using a cable, or a higher-bandwidth Wi-Fi connection to a high-quality
streaming service like Tidal or Amazon Music HD.  

Regardless, there are still plenty of options that are hugely powerful, great
looking, and with Bluetooth (as well as Wi-Fi and physical connections, too.
It should be added that few of these are battery-powered, due to their power
demands.

  * Naim Mu-so Qb 2

The [second-generation Qb](https://www.naimaudio.com/mu-so-qb) from British
audio company Naim is a compact cube (hence the name), but pushes out 300
watts of audio power, and includes Wi-Fo, AirPlay 2, Ethernet, and access to a
wide range of streaming services. And Bluetooth. The Qb is priced at $899.

  * Bowers & Wilkins Formation Wedge

Also priced at $899 is the [Bowers & Wilkins Formation
Wedge](https://www.bowerswilkins.com/en-gb/formation/wedge), a powerful and
high-quality speaker that offers Spotify and AirPlay over Wi-Fi, plus
Bluetooth. The speaker is available in black or silver.

  

[ Naim Mu-so Qb V2 Multi-Room Wireless Music System (Black) List Price:
$990.00 New From: $950.00 in Stock Used From: $849.00 in Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07YN72RH4?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

  

**Bluetooth speakers over $1,000**

The Gold Phantom has an extraordinary 4,500 watts of powerDevialet

Now we're into the Premier League of Bluetooth speakers. These offer huge
power, room-filling sound, a wide range of features and connectivity options,
and often a design that makes them a talking point of any room.  

  * Naim Mu-so 2

One of our favorites sees us return Naim and the [Mu-so
2](https://www.naimaudio.com/mu-so), which costs $1,600. The speaker doesn't
yet offer a voice assistant (although the company says it is looking into it),
but does offer Spotify, Tidal, Chromecast, and Bluetooth streaming, making it
smarter and more connected than anything Naim has made before. [Apple AirPlay
2](https://www.gearbrain.com/apple-airplay-2-explained-2528884795.html)
support means you can control the Mu-so 2 by speaking to Siri on your iPhone.

The Mu-so offers multi-room audio similar to Sonos, and can be plugged into a
TV via an HDMI cable to act as a high-end sound bar, too.

  

[ Naim Muso 2 wireless music speaker List Price: $1,690.00 New From: $1,650.00
in Stock Used From: $1,249.12 in Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07RQF6K1R?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

  

  * Bang & Olufsen Beosound A9

Alternatively, you could try the $3,000 [Bang & Olufsen Beosound
A9](https://www.amazon.com/Bang-Olufsen-Beoplay-Wireless-
Multiroom/dp/B07QKG6RND/ref=redir_mobile_desktop?ie=UTF8&aaxitk=YFzVYDEnfXFFmqgZLjz9rA&hsa_cr_id=5652557070401&ref_=sb_s_sparkle).
Its design is a few years old now, but the internals were recently updated for
its fourth generation, and now there's Google Assistant integration. The huge
speaker, which actually houses seven individual drivers, is finished in
Kvadrat fabric and is offered in a range of colors.

As well as having Google Assistant baked in for voice control, the Beoplay A9
has Apple [AirPlay 2](https://www.gearbrain.com/apple-
airplay-2-explained-2528884795.html) and Google Chromecast support for multi-
room music streaming.

  

[ Bang & Olufsen Beoplay A9 Wireless Speaker – Black List Price: $2,274.70 New
From: $2,274.70 in Stock Used From: $500.00 in Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00R9DJ1DI?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

  

  * Devialet Gold Phantom

Finally, we have the $2,990 [Devialet Gold
Phantom](https://www.amazon.com/Devialet-Gold-Phantom-High-end-
wireless/dp/B01MAVVRRE/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?dchild=1&keywords=devialet&qid=1590156544&sr=8-1-spons&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUEyT0lNWDhKM1gxSDVJJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwNzY5MDk1MlY2VFRFRE01VEc2QSZlbmNyeXB0ZWRBZElkPUEwOTQ4MzQzMUZRSUpTTE5KM0JRWiZ3aWRnZXROYW1lPXNwX2F0ZiZhY3Rpb249Y2xpY2tSZWRpcmVjdCZkb05vdExvZ0NsaWNrPXRydWU&th=1).
Quite possibly the most powerful Bluetooth speaker ever made, this has a
staggering 4,500 watts of audio power, which is good for 108 db. Connectivity
options include Wi-Fi, AirPlay, Spotify Connect and Bluetooth, and you can
connect several together for whole-house music.

**Devialet Gold Phantom - High-end Wireless Speaker -4500 Watts - 108 db**

  

[ Devialet Gold Phantom - High-end Wireless Speaker -4500 Watts - 108 db List
Price: $2,990.00 New From: $2,990.00 in Stock Used From: $2,699.99 in Stock
](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MAVVRRE?tag=gearbraincom-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)
